targets.rawSql: SELECT "ts", "Source", "Destination", "Packets", "Bytes", "Duration", NULLIF("anomaly_score", '')::double precision as anomaly_score FROM predictions_staging WHERE NULLIF("anomaly_score", '')::double precision IS NOT NULL AND "Packets" IS NOT NULL AND "Bytes" IS NOT NULL LIMIT 10000;

SELECT corr(NULLIF("anomaly_score", '')::double precision, "Packets"::double precision) FROM predictions_staging WHERE NULLIF("anomaly_score", '')::double precision IS NOT NULL AND "Packets" IS NOT NULL;
SELECT corr(NULLIF("anomaly_score", '')::double precision, "Bytes"::double precision) FROM predictions_staging WHERE NULLIF("anomaly_score", '')::double precision IS NOT NULL AND "Bytes" IS NOT NULL;
